applet_name: Archive every Tweet you post to a spreadsheet
applet_description: Create an archive of your Tweets in a Google Drive spreadsheet for simple tracking and to see all of your content at-a-glance. You can choose whether or not to include Retweets and @replies, too.

applet_name: Press a button to track work hours in Google Drive
applet_description: This makes a widget you can add to the home screen on your phone. Never hassle with another time-tracking software - when you start work, press the button widget. When you stop working, press it again. Your work hours will be tracked automatically in a Google Spreadsheet.

applet_name: Log how much time you spend at specific locations like the office or home in a spreadsheet
applet_description: Set the map on an area that you want to track and this Applet will add a row of info to a Google Drive spreadsheet each time you arrive at or leave the area.
applet_Trigger: You enter or exit an area

applet_name: Get LINE message when a new row is added
applet_description: Great for Sheets to track client leads, wedding RSVPs, and more. Receive a message in LINE when a new row is added to your Google Sheet.

applet_name: Track #hashtag mentions in a Google Spreadsheet
applet_description: Every time a certain #hashtag is used on Twitter, automatically track it in a Google Spreadsheet.

applet_name: Keep a simple spreadsheet of every Tweet you post
applet_description: Create an archive of your Tweets in Google Drive for eary tracking and to see all your content at-a-glance. Turn on this Applet and we'll create a spreadsheet for you in a folder called "Twitter."

applet_name: Log all players that killed my character
applet_description: This Applet will create a log in Google Sheets of all the Rust players that killed your character.
applet_Trigger: You were killed by another player

applet_name: Archive every tweet from a specific handle to a spreadsheet
applet_description: Keep a record of the tweets you care about — enter the username you want to track (no need to include the "@" symbol) and they'll be saved in a Google spreadsheet. This is also a good workaround for accounts you don't want to follow on Twitter — but still want to track!
applet_Trigger: New tweet by a specific user

applet_name: Keep a log of your recently played tracks
applet_description: Connect Spotify with Google Sheets to keep track of all of your recently played tracks

applet_name: Track your daily Fitbit activity in a Google spreadsheet
applet_description: Automatically track all of your daily Fitbit activity into a simple Google spreadsheet.

applet_name: Google Contacts saved to Google Drive Spreadsheet.
applet_description: Saves New Google Contacts to a spreadsheet in Google Drive.

applet_name: Log new items in Raindrop.io to a Google Sheet
applet_description: Title | URL | Tags | CreatedAt

applet_name: Put all your completed tasks in a Google Spreadsheet
applet_description: Document your accomplishments and completed tasks one-by-one in a Google spreadsheet.

applet_name: Sync all your new iOS Contacts to a Google Spreadsheet
applet_description: Automatically save new iOS Contacts you add to a Google spreadsheet for easy sorting and searching.

applet_name: Call Log, Answered Call
applet_description: This is part of a 3 recipe series to log all calls, (Missed, Placed, and Received) to the same Google Spreadsheet.

applet_name: Log WiFi connections/disconnections
applet_description: Log WiFi connections/disconnections
applet_Trigger: Connects or disconnects from any WiFi network

applet_name: Automatically log every call you make on your Android phone to a Google spreadsheet
applet_description: Every call you make will be automatically logged to a spreadsheet in Google Drive for safe record keeping.

applet_name: Log all google calendar entries in a Google Spreadsheet
applet_description: Logs all newly created events into a spreadsheet in Google Drive.

applet_name: Back up new texts you receive on your Android device to a Google Spreadsheet
applet_description: Keep a record of your messages. No more endless scrolling! Every time you receive a new text message it will be automatically added to a Google Spreadsheet.

applet_name: Call Log, Missed call
applet_description: This is part of a 3 recipe series to log all calls, (Missed, Placed, and Received) to the same Google Spreadsheet.

applet_name: Google Calendar Events to Spreadsheet
applet_description: Add your events to a spreadsheet and then export for analysis or do it right inside Google Sheets!

applet_name: Track your liked videos in Sheets
applet_description: Add a row to a Google Sheet every time you like a new video. Simple way to track the videos you like, easy to reference and search the file.

applet_name: Send an email to add a line to a google drive spreadsheet
applet_description: Send an email to add a line to a google drive spreadsheet

applet_name: Send weight measurements to Google Sheets
applet_description: Send weight measurements to Google Sheets
applet_Trigger: When I have a new weight

applet_name: Save the Tweets you like on Twitter to a Google Spreadsheet
applet_description: A great way to archive and organize the Tweets you like on Twitter.

applet_name: Track work hours in a Google Spreadsheet
applet_description: Keep track of your work hours by entering the number of hours your worked or when you started/ended at the end of every day. It will be stored in a Google Spreadsheet so you don't have to bother with it.

applet_name: Save notifications from all of your apps to a Google spreadsheet
applet_description: This Applet will collect every notification you receive from all of your apps (except for the IFTTT app) and add to a Google Drive spreadsheet.

applet_name: Automatically add your saved tracks in Spotify to a Google spreadsheet
applet_description: Keep track of your listening habits by automatically saving all new saved tracks to a Google spreadsheet.

applet_name: Automatically log work hours in a spreadsheet
applet_description: Record your work hours automatically when you enter your workplace.

applet_name: Automatically save your Strava activities to a Google spreadsheet
applet_description: This Applet will save all the info about your new Strava activities to a Google spreadsheet.

applet_name: Log motion from Ring into Google Drive
applet_description: Keep a log of any movement at your front door through Google Drive.

applet_name: Save your Fitbit sleep logs to a Google Spreadsheet
applet_description: Keep a record of your sleep patterns by automatically saving your Fitbit sleep logs into a Google spreadsheet.

applet_name: Trello Cards to Google Sheet
applet_description: Adds any cards that have been added to a particular board in Trello to your Google Spreadsheet

applet_name: SMS Timeline 2/2
applet_description:
This is the second half of a 2 part recipe.With both recipes all SMS messages received and sent are recorded in a spreadsheet in Google Drive.
Other half is here: https://ifttt.com/recipes/165475-sms-timeline

applet_name: Log my card purchases to a spreadsheet
applet_description: Keep a handy record of all your spending in a Google Sheet.

applet_name: Track my bedtime in a Google Spreadsheet
applet_description: Every time Withings Sleep detects you get into bed, the time will be logged in a Google Spreadsheet.

applet_name: Add row to Google Sheets using MESH
applet_description: This Action will add a single row to the bottom of the first worksheet of the spreadsheet you specify. NOTE: A new spreadsheet is created after 2000 rows.

applet_name: Log Tempest data to Google Sheets
applet_description: Log data every 1minute to Google Sheets file.  Columns = Timestamp, AirTemp, Humidity, Pressure, WindAvg, WindDir, WindLull, WindGust, Rain, UV, Brightness, SolarRadiation, LightningStrikeCount, HeatIndex, DewPoint, WetBulbTemperature, DeltaT, AirDensity, TimestampEpoch, StationName

applet_name: Log Device Turning On to a Google Spreadsheet
applet_description: Automatically log every time a device turns on to a Google spreadsheet.

applet_name: Google スプレッドシートに新しい行が追加されたらChatworkに通知
applet_description: Google スプレッドシートに新しい行が追加された場合、追加された行の情報（A列〜J列までの値）をグループチャットに通知します。

applet_name: Youtube Uploads to Google Doc
applet_description: Youtube Uploads to Google Doc
applet_Trigger: New public video uploaded by you

applet_name: Track every time the ISS passes over your house
applet_description: Keep track of every time the ISS flys above your home in outer space!
applet_Trigger: ISS passes over a specific location

applet_name: Keep a log of every time your hearing aid loses its connection
applet_description: Every time the Bluetooth connection between your hearing aid and mobile phone is lost, this Applet will add a row a Google Sheet named Oticon Activity Log.

applet_name: Track when I get out of bed in a Google Spreadsheet
applet_description: Every time Withings Sleep detects you get out of bed, the time will be logged in a Google Spreadsheet.
applet_Trigger: When I get out of bed

applet_name: MyQ open history
applet_description:
When your garage door is opened, this applet will log activity to a spreadsheet.

This applet requires an active account linking subscription.

applet_name: Log doorbell rings in a Google Drive spreadsheet
applet_description: Keep a complete log of all your Ring doorbell activity in a Google Drive spreadsheet.

applet_name: Keep a Spreadsheet Log of Each Blink Motion Alert
applet_description: Append a Google Sheet on your Drive (blink/blink-alerts) with camera name and date/time for every motion alert on a Blink System.

applet_name: Add new scheduled Calendly events to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
applet_description: This Applet will track new scheduled Calendly events in a Google Sheets spreadsheet.

applet_name: Keep a log of every time your hearing aid has a low battery
applet_description: Every time your hearing aid has a low battery, this Applet will add a row a Google Sheet named Oticon Activity Log.
